long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest way to Design graphics, social media posters, blog hero images and more

This Chrome extension for MockFlow Designer helps with the following

* Provides instant access to MockFlow designer tool anywhere on the web 
* Export high quality retina ready graphics and upload it 
* Access to thousands of illustrations, icons and templates
* Easily share your designs by uploading from chrome extension to your favorite tools like Instagram poster, twitter coverart, website images...
